tests.name: Window Size Impact
tests.hypothesis: Different window sizes produce different coherence scores

5000ms.summary: Aggregated 4 temporal windows from gameplay notes. Score progression: 30 → 175 (+145). Temporal cohe

10000ms.summary: Aggregated 2 temporal windows from gameplay notes. Score progression: 54 → 149 (+95). Temporal coher

20000ms.summary: Aggregated 1 temporal windows from gameplay notes. Score progression: 98 → 98 (0). Temporal coherenc

30000ms.summary: Aggregated 1 temporal windows from gameplay notes. Score progression: 99 → 99 (0). Temporal coherenc

tests.notes: Window size should affect window count and potentially coherence

tests.name: Decay Factor Impact
tests.hypothesis: Lower decay factors reduce weight of older notes
tests.notes: Decay factor should affect weight distribution over time

tests.name: Coherence Weight Sensitivity
tests.hypothesis: Coherence should be sensitive to input consistency
tests.notes: Coherence should respond to changes in observation and score consistency

tests.name: Default Values Validation
tests.notes: Default values should produce reasonable, non-extreme results

tests.name: Edge Case Handling
tests.hypothesis: Magic numbers handle edge cases gracefully
tests.notes: Edge cases should not crash and should produce reasonable values

recommendations.issue: Decay factor may not be working as expected
